item.title: On Climbing and Failure
item.description: On Climbing and Failure I’ve been ruminating on failure recently afer realizing I’m too cautious when climbing indoors1 and it may be stunting progress in a pretty non-trivial way. Background What kicked off this particular iteration of self-reflection was running into a friend at the bouldering gym with whom I lead-climb2 regularly. He was excited to show me his bouldering project which was a v9.3 Our skill levels are similar so I was surprised by the grade.
